name: Grenade_Launcher
display_help: Launches an M30 Grenade at long range from under the barrel of your Assault rifle. The explosion from the grenade affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
display_target_help: Launches a rocket at long range. The explosion affects all within the blast and can knock them back.
